response.responses: What seems to be the problem?
Are you sure you don't need help? Please say goodbye to confirm.
I will attempt calling your chosen emergency contacts. Should I proceed?
Attempting to reach chosen contacts. They will be contacted soon.
I suggest lying down and resting. Would you like some cream for the pain?
I highly recommend putting a band-aid. Would you like one?
I highly recommend applying cold water to burnt area. I have vaseline if you wish to apply it.
Try drinking some water first. If you need I have antacid tablets to help with acidity.
Remove the stinger if present and apply some ice on the area. I have some lotion if you would like it.
Glad I could be of service! Goodbye.
